TopicTitle: Frames drop over time until it gets unplayable

Articles.Content:
Lag goes away when loading a save but again after a period of time it gets unplayable.

This started to happen when I updated a number of mods through Ckan, before it was working fine.

 

KSP 1.4.2

 

Output log file link

https://drive.google.com/open?id=1MX_T2f5grUbxZH0CGlCH2h-3t9qQVn2l

 

Please help me

Took a look at memgraph, it may or may not solve your problems, but it's worth a shot.  Read the thread, and follow the instrutions:

[1.2.x/1.3] MemGraph 1.1.0.3 - with Stutter Reduction - Add-on Releases - Kerbal Space Program Forums
